name: Hitmonchan
flavorText: While seeming to do nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.

strengths: 20 damage for 1 energy is incredibly efficient
70 HP is solid for a Basic
weaknesses: Psychic weakness to Mewtwo and Alakazam
synergies: PlusPower - Boost Jab to 30 damage turn 1
Double Colorless Energy - Quick Special Punch
counters: Mr. Mime - Blocks both attacks with Invisible Wall

competitiveHistory: Hitmonchan was one of the defining cards of the Haymaker archetype and early Pokemon TCG. Turn 1 Jab for 20 damage set the pace of aggressive play. Combined with PlusPower, Hitmonchan could threaten 30 damage on turn 1, putting immediate pressure on opponents. It was an automatic inclusion in any aggressive deck.

rulings.ruling: Both Jab and Special Punch have no additional effects - they simply deal damage.
Hitmonchan cannot evolve as it has no evolution in the original sets.
